chefs.name: Hector Salamanca
chefs.description: Hector's love for pizza started in her grandmother's kitchen, where she learned the art of making the perfect Margherita.

chefs.name: Mario Rossi
chefs.description: With over 15 years of experience in crafting authentic Neapolitan pizzas, Mario brings a true taste of Italy to every dish.

chefs.name: Luigi Verdi
chefs.description: Luigi's passion for pizza shines through in every slice of his Pepperoni Pizza. Luigi brings a true taste of Italy to every dish.

chefs.name: Giovanni Romano
chefs.description: Luigi's passion for pizza shines through in every slice of his Pepperoni Pizza. Giovanni brings a true taste of Italy to every dish.

chefs.name: Moretti Gus
chefs.description: Moretti's BBQ Chicken Pizza is a crowd-pleaser, thanks to her unique blend of tangy BBQ sauce, tender chicken, and melty cheese.
